title: Happy Birthday, Shioriko-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Happy birthday, Shioriko-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Thank you, Shizuku-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Now then, let’s head over to the auditorium~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eh? Isn’t it going to be in the clubroom....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>No. We have a special performance for you today, Shioriko-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>A special performance....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Hanamaru-san and I made a play celebrating your birth, Shioriko-san. The original idea came from Kaoruko-sensei! She provided us with all kinds of stories from when you were born. Please look forward to the performance of the school idol troupe!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eeeeh!? I’m truly grateful that you’re doing a special performance for me, but.... the original idea.... and the stories.... H-, how much did she tell you....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufufu.... You’ll have to see everything for yourself, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Wait! I’m too scared to watch it! Please stop pulling me, Shizuku-san~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
